events.message: test: make wallet_migration.py pass with both wallet flags
test: prefer sqlite for wallet tests

events.body:
> Looks like you'll need to add a missing --legacy-wallet to the failing test?

Addressed this in a different (hopefully better way) by making `wallet_migration.py` pass with both wallet flags
